text: The Edge is a 1997 American Canadian adventure movie directed by Lee Tamahori and starring Alec Baldwin, Anthony Hopkins, Elle Macpherson, L. Q. Jones, Bart the Bear. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1997 movies Category:1997 adventure movies Category:1990s American adventure movies Category:Canadian adventure movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Lee Tamahori Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:Movies set in Alaska Category:Movies set in British Columbia Category:Movies about bears Category:Movies about death Category:Movies set in forests
title: The Edge (1997 movie)
